name: Dwarf Climbers
description:
An action scroller made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 43 where you play as two Dwarves trying to mine ore on the side of the mountain. However, hazards along the way may force them to make the ultimate decision: to save their friend, or themselves!

Note: The Dwarves are currently not animated :< but they will receive an animation update in the near future!

Ludum Dare page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/43/dwarf-climbers
